name: Jormungandr
description: Jormungandr, the Midgart Serpent, encircling the world and upholding the earth, rules ober seas and storms, shrouded in mystery with a wide-brimmed hat concealing the face.

skills.name: Venom Spray
skills.description: Upon entering battle, summons a poison mist around Jormungandr, dealing damage equal to 70% of ATK every second to nearby enemies.

upgrades.level2: Leaves a poison pool when falling. The poison pool lasts 10s and deals damage every second equal to twice the poison mist damage. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Damage per second increased to 85% of ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Damage per second increased to 100% of ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

skills.name: Serpent’s Gnawing
skills.description: Jormungandr leaps into the air and rains down a swarm of snakes 5 times, each hit dealing damage equal to 100% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Becomes invincible for the skill’s duration.
upgrades.level3: Damage per hit increased to 110% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Damage per hit increased to 120% of ATK.

skills.name: Serpent’s Approach
skills.description: Jormungandr slides forward, dealing damage equal to 200% of ATK to enemies along the path.

upgrades.level2: Gains a shield equal to 250% of ATK for 6s.
upgrades.level4: Gains a shield equal to 300% of ATK for 6s.

skills.name: Serpent’s Molt
skills.description: Upon taking lethal damage, Jormungandr enters the Revenge state, survives for 5s, and stores 60% of all damage taken. When Revenge expires, stored damage is dealt as True Damage to nearby enemies.

upgrades.level4: Reflects 100% of damage taken. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

relic.name: Serpent’s Lure
relic.description: Jormungandr releases a swarm of snakes, dealing damage equal to 200% of ATK to nearby enemies and pulling them within a 1-meter range.

upgrades.level4: Pulled enemies take 10% increased damage for the next 3s. (Unlocks at Lv.281)
